author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Omega Announces Restructuring Plan For Orianna Facilities
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Omega Healthcare Investors Inc:
* OMEGA ANNOUNCES RESTRUCTURING PLAN FOR ORIANNA FACILITIES
* OMEGA HEALTHCARE INVESTORS INC - ‍REAFFIRMS ADJUSTED FFO GUIDANCE​
* OMEGA HEALTHCARE INVESTORS - CO’S ‍TENANT, 4 WEST HOLDINGS COMMENCED VOLUNTARY CHAPTER 11 PROCEEDINGS
* OMEGA HEALTHCARE INVESTORS - ITS TENANT, 4 WEST HOLDINGS& SOME OF ITS AFFILIATES STARTED VOLUNTARY CHAPTER 11 PROCEEDINGS IN U.S BANKRUPTCY COURT
* OMEGA HEALTHCARE INVESTORS - ‍CO HAS PROVIDED A COMMITMENT FOR UP TO $30 MILLION IN DEBTOR-IN-POSSESSION (“DIP”) FINANCING TO PROVIDE LIQUIDITY TO THE DEBTORS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
